Articles.Content:
本模组采用CC BY-NC-ND协定

版权及解释权归万户组所有

转载标注作者：万户或Wanhu（英文）

长征五号运载火箭，又称“大火箭”“胖五”，是中华人民共和国为了满足更多航天发展需要，并兼有中外差异而在2006年立项开发的一次性大型低温液体捆绑式运载火箭，也是中国新一代运载火箭中芯级直径为5米的火箭系列。2019年底，长征五号遥二运载火箭实现复飞。

这次万户组发布的长征五号为长征五号的基本型（代号：CZ-5），为带助推器的两级火箭。助推器采用4个3.35米直径模块，每个助推器配置2台120吨级液氧煤油发动机YF-100，每个助推器有1台发动机可单向翻转。一子级采用5米直径模块，安装2台可双向摇摆的50吨级氢氧发动机YF-77。二子级采用改进的自长征三号甲运载火箭三子级氢氧氧发动机的YF-75D作为主动力，发动机可双向转换，能起动，同时配备辅助动力系统。与有效阳离子-起垂直整体运输，吊装。

这一版本的长征五号支持从KSP180——KSP191的所有版本。

本模组暂时只支持简体中文，且暂不开放本地化授权。

This module adopts CC BY-NC-ND agreement

Copyright and interpretation rights belong to Wanhu Group

Reprinted mark of: 万户 or Wanhu (English)

The Long March 5 launch vehicle, also known as the "Big Rocket" and the "Fat 5", is a disposable large-scale low-temperature liquid bundling launch vehicle developed by the People's Republic of China in 2006 in order to meet the needs of more aerospace development, with both Chinese and foreign differences. It is also a series of rockets with a core diameter of 5 meters for a new generation of Chinese launch vehicles. At the end of 2019, the Long March 5 Yao-2 carrier rocket achieved a go-around.

The Long March 5 released by the Wanhu Group is the basic version of the Long March 5 (code: CZ-5), which is a two-stage rocket with a booster. The booster uses four 3.35-meter diameter modules. Each booster is equipped with two 120-ton-class liquid oxygen kerosene engines YF-100. Each booster has one engine that can be unidirectionally turned. One sub-stage uses a 5-meter-diameter module, and is equipped with two 50-ton hydrogen-oxygen engines YF-77 that can swing in both directions. The second sub-stage uses the improved YF-75D of the three-stage oxyhydrogen engine of the Long March No. 3 carrier rocket as the main power. The engine can be switched in both directions and can be started. It is also equipped with an auxiliary power system. Vertical transport with effective cation-lifting, hoisting.

This version of the Long March V supports all versions from KSP180-KSP191.

This module only supports Simplified Chinese for the time being, and localization authorization is not open for the time being.

 

下载链接（Download Address）：https://mod.3dmgame.com/mod/149988
